languages.text: {n}Винтерскейл отмахивается.{/n} "Скорее кровоточащие клочья протектората. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Варп{/g}-шторм разодрал его на куски, но мои слуги соберут его воедино. А не соберут — отрублю им головы и найду более толковых помощников".

traits.locale_text: {n}Винтерскейл отмахивается.{/n} "Скорее кровоточащие клочья империи. Варп-шторм разодрал ее на куски, но мои слуги соберут ее воедино. А не соберут — отрублю им головы и найду более толковых помощников".

languages.text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."
languages.original_text: {n}Винтерскейл отмахивается.{/n} "Скорее кровоточащие клочья протектората. {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Варп{/g}-шторм разодрал его на куски, но мои слуги соберут его воедино. А не соберут — отрублю им головы и найду более толковых помощников".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos waves you away.{/n} "More like the bleeding scraps of one. The warp storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

{n}Calligos waves you away.{/n} "More like the bleeding scraps of one. The warp storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

{n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

languages.text: {n}カリゴスはあなたを追い払うように手を振る。{/n}「保護領だと？どっちかといえば、保護領の残骸を吐きだしてる場所だな。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の嵐でずたずたになったんだが、従者どもがつなぎ合わせて元に戻す予定だ。それが叶わないなら―奴らの首を切り落として、もっと使える奴を充てる」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスはあなたを追い払うように手を振る。{/n}「保護領だと？どっちかといえば、保護領の残骸を吐きだしてる場所だな。{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の嵐でずたずたになったんだが、従者どもがつなぎ合わせて元に戻す予定だ。それが叶わないなら―奴らの首を切り落として、もっと使える奴を充てる」

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯不耐烦地挥了挥手。{/n}“什么王朝？不过是千疮百孔的破烂罢了，那场{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}风暴把它撕成了碎片。不过，就算是破烂，我的手下也可以把它们拼得完好如初。如果他们做不到，我就砍了他们的脑袋，另寻高明。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯不耐烦地挥了挥手。{/n}“什么王朝？不过是千疮百孔的破烂罢了，那场{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}风暴把它撕成了碎片。不过，就算是破烂，我的手下也可以把它们拼得完好如初。如果他们做不到，我就砍了他们的脑袋，另寻高明。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos hace un gesto de desdén.{/n} «¿Protectorado? Se referirá a lo que queda del mío. La tormenta de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} lo ha hecho pedazos, pero mis sirvientes lo recompondrán. Y si no, les cortaré la cabeza a todos y buscaré a alguien que sí sea capaz».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos hace un gesto de desdén.{/n} «¿Protectorado? Se referirá a lo que queda del mío. La tormenta de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} lo ha hecho pedazos, pero mis sirvientes lo recompondrán. Y si no, les cortaré la cabeza a todos y buscaré a alguien que sí sea capaz».

languages.text: « Mon protectorat ? {n}répète Calligos avec un signe de la main dédaigneux.{/n} Vous voulez dire les restes agonisants d'un protectorat, oui. Mon territoire a été ravagé par la tempête {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, mais j'ai chargé mes serviteurs d'en recoller les morceaux. Et s'ils échouent, je leur trancherai la tête et les remplacerai par des mains plus capables. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: « Mon protectorat ? {n}répète Calligos avec un signe de la main dédaigneux.{/n} Vous voulez dire les restes agonisants d'un protectorat, oui. Mon territoire a été ravagé par la tempête {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}, mais j'ai chargé mes serviteurs d'en recoller les morceaux. Et s'ils échouent, je leur trancherai la tête et les remplacerai par des mains plus capables. »

languages.text: {n}Calligos winkt ab.{/n} "Protektorat? Eher ein blutiger Schrotthaufen. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsturm{/g} hat es komplett zerlegt, aber meine Diener werden es wieder zusammensetzen. Und falls nicht ... lasse ich sie köpfen und suche mir fähigere Helfer."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos winkt ab.{/n} "Protektorat? Eher ein blutiger Schrotthaufen. Der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warpsturm{/g} hat es komplett zerlegt, aber meine Diener werden es wieder zusammensetzen. Und falls nicht ... lasse ich sie köpfen und suche mir fähigere Helfer."

languages.text: {n}Calligos pek kulak asmıyor.{/n} "Protektora mı kaldı sanki? {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} fırtınası dağıttı gitti, neyse ki hizmetkârlarım tekrar toparlayacak. Şayet toparlayamazlarsa kellelerini alacak ve daha yetenekli yardımcılar bulacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos waves you off.{/n} "Protectorate? More like the bleeding scraps of one. The {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} storm tore it to shreds, but my servants will piece it back together. And if they don't — I'll chop off their heads and find myself more capable helpers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos pek kulak asmıyor.{/n} "Protektora mı kaldı sanki? {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Öteboyut{/g} fırtınası dağıttı gitti ama hizmetkârlarım tekrar toparlayacak. Şayet toparlayamazlarsa kafalarını kesecek ve kendime daha yetenekli yardımcılar bulacağım."
